trans-unit.source: Provides navigation and a user interface (UI) to collect related data across multiple steps.
trans-unit.target: 提供巡覽和使用者介面 (UI)，在多個步驟中收集相關資料。

trans-unit.target: 本主題內容：

trans-unit.target: [簡介](#introduction)

trans-unit.target: [精靈元件](#components)

trans-unit.target: [精靈步驟](#wizard_steps)

trans-unit.target: [資料收集精靈](#collecting_wizard_data)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 簡介

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control to:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制權傳輸至：

trans-unit.source: Collect related data across multiple steps.
trans-unit.target: 收集多個步驟的相關的資料。

trans-unit.source: Break up a larger Web page used to collect user input into smaller logical steps.
trans-unit.target: 分割大型的 Web 網頁，用來收集使用者輸入成較小的邏輯步驟。

trans-unit.source: Allow for either linear or nonlinear navigation through the steps.
trans-unit.target: 允許逐步線性或非線性導覽。

trans-unit.source: Wizard Components
trans-unit.target: 精靈元件

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control is made up of the following components:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項由下列元件所組成：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection of steps that contain the user interface for each step, as defined by the page developer.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>集合包含每個步驟的使用者介面所定義的網頁開發人員的步驟。

trans-unit.source: Built-in navigation capabilities that determine the appropriate buttons to display based on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 內建瀏覽功能，以決定適當的按鈕以顯示根據<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: A header area that can be customized to display information specific to the step that the user is currently on.
trans-unit.target: 標頭區域，可自訂步驟的使用者是目前在顯示的特定資訊。

trans-unit.source: A sidebar area that can be used to quickly navigate to steps in the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項中的步驟可用來快速瀏覽到 [資訊看板] 區域。

trans-unit.source: If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> is persisted in Source view.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，請注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>保存在原始碼檢視。

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> might be pointing to a different step.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A>屬性在設計檢視中按一下 [資訊看板] 按鈕時，您接著執行網頁的第一個步驟`Wizard`控制項可能不會顯示，因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>可能指向不同的步驟。

trans-unit.source: Wizard Steps
trans-unit.target: 精靈步驟

trans-unit.source: Each of the steps in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A> property that determines the kind of navigation functionality that the step has.
trans-unit.target: 每個中的步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A>屬性，可決定此步驟中有的瀏覽功能的類型。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A> property, the default value is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Auto>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A>屬性，預設值是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Auto>。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A> property and the resulting behavior of the step.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A>屬性及步驟的產生的行為。

trans-unit.source: The navigation UI that is rendered for the step is determined by the order in which the step is declared.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽步驟呈現 UI 是由宣告該步驟的順序決定。

trans-unit.source: The step is the last one to appear.
trans-unit.target: 此步驟為最後一個出現，

trans-unit.source: No navigation buttons are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 不會呈現巡覽按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The step is the last one that collects user data.
trans-unit.target: 步驟是收集使用者資料的最後一個。

trans-unit.source: The **Finish** button is rendered for navigation.
trans-unit.target: **完成**呈現巡覽按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The step is the first one to appear.
trans-unit.target: 此步驟為第一個出現，

trans-unit.source: A **Previous** button is not rendered.
trans-unit.target: A**上一步**不呈現 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The step is any step between the first and last.
trans-unit.target: 在步驟之間的任一步驟第一個和最後一個。

trans-unit.source: **Previous** and **Next** buttons are rendered for navigation.
trans-unit.target: 應呈現出 [上一步] 和 [下一步] 巡覽按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Collecting Wizard Data
trans-unit.target: 資料收集精靈

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control, data can be collected through linear or nonlinear navigation.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項，可以透過線性或非線性導覽收集資料。

trans-unit.source: Some examples of nonlinear navigation are skipping unnecessary steps or returning to a previously completed step to change some value.
trans-unit.target: 非線性導覽的一些範例會略過不必要的步驟，或傳回先前完成的步驟，以變更某些值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control maintains its state between steps, so the data entered on a step does not need to be persisted to a data store until all the steps of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control have been completed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項保持其狀態的步驟，因此不需要會保存到資料存放區，直到所有步驟的上一個步驟輸入的資料之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項都已完成。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you want to persist the collected data to a data store as each step is completed, such as when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick> event is raised, you should set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object to `false` so that the user cannot return to a previously completed step and change the data once it has been submitted.
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果您想要收集的資料保存到資料存放區為每個步驟完成，例如當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick>就會引發事件，應將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>物件`false`，讓使用者無法回復至先前完成的步驟，且一旦已提交變更的資料。

trans-unit.source: Wizard Command Names
trans-unit.target: 精靈的命令名稱

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control inherits the following command names from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> class and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> class: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.NextViewCommandName>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.PreviousViewCommandName>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SwitchViewByIDCommandName>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SwitchViewByIndexCommandName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項繼承下列的命令名稱，從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>類別和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>類別： <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.NextViewCommandName>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.PreviousViewCommandName>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SwitchViewByIDCommandName>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SwitchViewByIndexCommandName>。

trans-unit.source: The Wizard control ignores these command names and does not include any special logic to enable these commands to automatically work for navigation.
trans-unit.target: 精靈控制項忽略這些命令名稱，而且不包含任何特殊的邏輯，可啟用瀏覽自動執行這些命令。

trans-unit.source: If a command name is removed or is missing from a button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control, no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令名稱遭到移除，或遺漏功能的按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項，擲回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A> button is missing a value for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>, no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>按鈕遺漏的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>，擲回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Dynamically Changing Steps
trans-unit.target: 動態變更步驟

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveTo%2A> method or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> property to dynamically change the step that is currently displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveTo%2A>方法或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>屬性動態變更目前顯示在中的步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you programmatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> in the `Page_Load` event handler, you must add the navigation to that step prior to the page loading.
trans-unit.target: 如果您以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep>中`Page_Load`事件處理常式，您必須新增瀏覽到該頁面載入之前的步驟。

trans-unit.source: Wizard Appearance
trans-unit.target: 精靈的外觀

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control is fully customizable through templates, skins, and style settings.
trans-unit.target: 外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項是可以完全自訂，透過範本、 面板和樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A> properties to customize the interface of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A>屬性，以自訂的介面<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A> property recreates the child controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A>屬性重新建立的子控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the view state for the child controls is lost in the process.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，子控制項的檢視狀態中的程序會遺失。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this situation, explicitly maintain the control state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control's child controls explicitly, or avoid putting controls inside of templates.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這種情況下，明確地維持控制項狀態的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項的子系會明確地控制，或避免讓範本內部的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control does not support special Microsoft Internet Explorer rendering for non-standard or quirks mode.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項不支援特殊的 Microsoft Internet Explorer 呈現的非標準或 quirks 模式。

trans-unit.source: To get the best Internet Explorer rendering using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control, use the XHTML doc type, which is added by default in Visual Web Developer and Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得最佳的 Internet Explorer 轉譯使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制，請使用 XHTML 文件類型，它會根據預設，Visual Web Developer 和 Visual Studio 中加入。

trans-unit.source: Formatting Using Layout Templates
trans-unit.target: 使用版面配置範本

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control lets you specify the layout of the control without requiring you to use an HTML `table` element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項可讓您指定控制項的配置，而不需要您使用 HTML`table`項目。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you can use a `LayoutTemplate` element to specify the layout.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您可以使用`LayoutTemplate`項目來指定版面配置。

trans-unit.source: In the template, you create placeholder controls to indicate where items should be dynamically inserted into the control.
trans-unit.target: 在範本中，您建立預留位置，表示其中的項目應該以動態方式插入控制項的控制項。

trans-unit.source: (This is similar to how the template model for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control works.) For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: (這是類似於如何範本模型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制運作。)如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性 (Property)。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: 協助工具選項

trans-unit.source: For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 宣告式語法

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control to collect a user's name and address, with the option to enter a separate shipping address.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項來收集使用者的名稱和地址，請輸入不同的送貨地址的選項。

trans-unit.source: If the user does not select **SeparateShippingCheckBox**, thereby issuing a request to add a separate shipping address, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control moves directly from `Step2` to `Finish`.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者未選取**SeparateShippingCheckBox**，藉此發出要求來加入個別的送貨地址，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項直接從移`Step2`至`Finish`。

trans-unit.source: On the `Finish` step, the user has the option to return to the beginning of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control by clicking **GoBackButton**; however, it takes the user to `Step2` because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn%2A> property for `Step1` is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 上`Finish`步驟中，使用者可以選擇返回開頭<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>，即可控制**GoBackButton**; 不過，它會採用使用者`Step2`因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn%2A>屬性`Step1`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is the code-behind file for the Web page used in the preceding example.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是上述範例中所使用的網頁的程式碼後置檔案。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.%23ctor%2A>建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the step in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps" /> collection that is currently displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前顯示給使用者之 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps" /> 集合中的步驟。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> that is currently displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 目前顯示給使用者的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A> property returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object that is currently displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A>屬性會傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>目前顯示在物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A> property is read-only; however, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A> property to access the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A>屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A>屬性來存取目前的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> property to dynamically change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A> to a different <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>屬性動態地變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A>到不同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>物件。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveTo%2A> method to dynamically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveTo%2A>方法，以動態設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A> property to determine which step to set as the next <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A>屬性來判斷哪個設定的下一個步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the value of `CheckBox1.Checked` is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A> property is set to `Wizard1.Step3`; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A> property is set to `Wizard1.Step2`.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`CheckBox1.Checked`是`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A>屬性設定為`Wizard1.Step3`，否則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A>屬性設定為`Wizard1.Step2`。

trans-unit.source: The corresponding <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex" /> is less than -1 or greater than the number of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: 對應的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex" /> 小於 -1，或大於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 物件數目。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user switches to a new step in the control.
trans-unit.target: 在使用者切換至控制項中的新步驟時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged> event is raised when the current step that is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged>事件時引發目前的步驟，顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制的變更。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged> event to provide additional processing when the current step of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control changes.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged>事件來提供額外的處理時的目前步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制的變更。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged> event to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderText%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged>事件來更新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderText%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> 物件的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> that is currently displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 目前顯示在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> 控制項中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 物件索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> property provides the zero-based index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object that is currently displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>屬性提供的以零為起始的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>目前顯示在物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> property to control which step is displayed to the user at run time.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過程式設計方式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>屬性，即可控制哪些步驟，會在執行階段顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> is persisted in Source view.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，請注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>保存在原始碼檢視。

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> might be pointing to a different step.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A>屬性在設計檢視中按一下 [資訊看板] 按鈕時，您接著執行網頁的第一個步驟`Wizard`控制項可能不會顯示，因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>可能指向不同的步驟。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> to -1 to support a wizard with no steps by default, the following behavior occurs:
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>會為支援具有預設的任何步驟的精靈-1，發生下列行為：

trans-unit.source: If you declaratively set <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> to -1 or set it to -1 as a default value, the control will always try to render the first step in the wizard.
trans-unit.target: 如果您以宣告方式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>-1 或其設為-1 做為預設值，控制項將永遠嘗試轉譯精靈的第一個步驟的集合。

trans-unit.source: If you programmatically set <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> to -1, the control will not render.
trans-unit.target: 如果您以程式設計方式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>為-1，控制項將不會呈現。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> property to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>屬性來設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the value of `CheckBox1.Checked` is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A> property is set to `Wizard1.Step3`; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A> property is set to `Wizard1.Step2`.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`CheckBox1.Checked`是`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A>屬性設定為`Wizard1.Step3`，否則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A>屬性設定為`Wizard1.Step2`。

trans-unit.source: The selected value is higher than the number of wizard steps defined in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 選取的值大於 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps" /> 集合中定義的精靈步驟數目。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> object being checked.
trans-unit.target: 正在檢查之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> 物件的索引。

trans-unit.source: Uses a Boolean value to determine whether the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep" /> property can be set to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> object that corresponds to the index that is passed in.
trans-unit.target: 使用布林值來判斷 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep" /> 屬性是否可以設定為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> 物件，該物件對應至傳入的索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if the index passed in refers to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> that has already been accessed and its <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />; otherwise, <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳入之索引參考已經存取的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" />，且其 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="false" />，則為 <see langword="false" />，否則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.AllowNavigationToStep%2A> method can be accessed from a derived class only because of its `protected` modifier.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.AllowNavigationToStep%2A>方法可以存取的衍生類別只因為從其`protected`修飾詞。

trans-unit.source: In a derived class, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.AllowNavigationToStep%2A> method to determine whether the index that is passed in can be used to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.AllowNavigationToStep%2A>方法，以判斷是否會在傳遞的索引可以用來設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.AllowNavigationToStep%2A> method will return `false` if the index that is passed in refers to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object that has already been accessed and has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn%2A> property set to `false`; otherwise, it will return `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.AllowNavigationToStep%2A>方法會傳回`false`如果傳入的索引是指<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>物件已被存取，且具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn%2A>屬性設定為`false`; 否則它會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a derived class named `CustomWizard` and override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.OnSideBarButtonClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立衍生的類別，名為`CustomWizard`並覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.OnSideBarButtonClick%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When a button on the sidebar area of the `CustomWizard` control is clicked, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.AllowNavigationToStep%2A> method is called to determine whether the selected step can be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 當 [資訊看板] 區域上的按鈕`CustomWizard`按一下控制項時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.AllowNavigationToStep%2A>呼叫方法來判斷是否可以存取選取的步驟。

trans-unit.source: A message is then written to the containing Web page informing the user of what has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 然後會將訊息寫入至通知所發生的情況的使用者在包含網頁。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the **Cancel** button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在按一下 [取消] 按鈕時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonClick> event is raised when the **Cancel** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonClick>就會引發事件時**取消**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonClick> event to provide additional processing when the **Cancel** button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonClick>事件來提供額外的處理時**取消**按鈕。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the **Cancel** button is clicked, the page is redirected to http://www.wingtiptoys.com/.
trans-unit.target: 當**取消**按一下按鈕時，頁面會重新導向至http://www.wingtiptoys.com/。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the identifier for the **Cancel** button.
trans-unit.target: 指定 [取消] 按鈕的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: This field is static and read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是靜態且唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonID> field is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonID>欄位主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonID> is `"CancelButton"`.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonID>是`"CancelButton"`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the image displayed for the **Cancel** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 [取消] 按鈕的顯示影像 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image displayed for the **Cancel** button on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示影像的 URL**取消**按鈕<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Image>, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonImageUrl%2A> property to specify the image to display for the **Cancel** button.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Image>，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定要顯示之影像**取消** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of style properties that define the appearance of the **Cancel** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得樣式屬性集合的參考，這些屬性定義 [取消] 按鈕的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that defines the style settings for **Cancel** on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />所定義的樣式設定**取消**上<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonStyle%2A> property defines the appearance for the **Cancel** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonStyle%2A>屬性定義的外觀**取消**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonStyle%2A> property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonStyle%2A>屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Any setting that is applied in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonStyle%2A> property overrides the corresponding setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的任何設定也就套用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonStyle%2A>屬性會覆寫中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text caption that is displayed for the **Cancel** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 [取消] 按鈕的顯示文字標題。

trans-unit.source: The text caption displayed for **Cancel** on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: 顯示的文字標題**取消**上<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <c>"Cancel"</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<c>[取消]</c>。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the current locale for the server.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設文字會依據伺服器目前的地區設定進行當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonText%2A> property contains the text that is displayed for the **Cancel** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonText%2A>屬性會包含文字的顯示**取消**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonType%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonText%2A> property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image, or as the text of a link.
trans-unit.target: 值而定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonType%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonText%2A>屬性可顯示為文字的按鈕，以替代映像，或連結的文字顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonType%2A> values and their respective effects on the **Cancel** button text.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelButtonType%2A>值以及對其各自的影響**取消**按鈕文字。

trans-unit.source: Text appears on the button.
trans-unit.target: 文字會出現在按鈕上。

trans-unit.source: Text appears as alternative text for the image.
trans-unit.target: 文字會顯示為影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: Text appears as a link.
trans-unit.target: 文字會顯示為連結。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of button that is rendered as the **Cancel** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定呈現為 [取消] 按鈕的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the command name for the **Cancel** button.
trans-unit.target: 擷取 [取消] 按鈕的命令名稱。

trans-unit.source: This field is static and read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是靜態且唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelCommandName> field is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelCommandName>欄位主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelCommandName> is `"Cancel"`.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelCommandName>是`"Cancel"`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL that the user is directed to when they click the **Cancel** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當使用者按一下 [取消] 按鈕時會導向到的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL that the user is redirected to when they click **Cancel** on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用者重新導向至當使用者按一下 URL**取消**上<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelDestinationPageUrl%2A> property specifies the step that is displayed when the user clicks the **Cancel** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelDestinationPageUrl%2A>屬性會指定當使用者按一下顯示的步驟**取消**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplayCancelButton%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelDestinationPageUrl%2A> property is not set, the Web page is refreshed and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.OnCancelButtonClick%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplayCancelButton%2A>屬性設定為`true`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CancelDestinationPageUrl%2A>屬性未設定、 重新整理網頁時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.OnCancelButtonClick%2A>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of the cell and the cell border.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, between the contents of a cell and the cell border.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CellPadding%2A> property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell border.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CellPadding%2A>屬性，即可控制的儲存格的內容與儲存格框線之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount that is specified is added to all four sides of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 指定的填補量會加入至儲存格的四個邊。

trans-unit.source: All cells in a column share the same cell width; therefore, the spacing is applied to the widest cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: 資料行中的所有資料格會共用同一個儲存格的寬度。因此，間距會套用到資料行中最寬的資料格。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same cell height.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，相同的資料列中的所有資料格會共用相同的儲存格高度。

trans-unit.source: Thus, the spacing is applied to the tallest cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: 因此，間距會套用到資料列中最高的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: 個別儲存格大小不能指定。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CellPadding%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CellSpacing%2A> properties to program the layout of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CellPadding%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CellSpacing%2A>屬性以程式設計的版面配置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>以宣告方式控制。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between cells.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, between cells.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格之間的間距數量，以像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CellSpacing%2A> property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in a Wizard control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CellSpacing%2A>屬性來控制精靈控制項中的相鄰資料格之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 垂直和水平，則會套用這個間距。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CellPadding%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CellSpacing%2A> properties to program the layout of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CellPadding%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.CellSpacing%2A>屬性以程式設計的版面配置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>以宣告方式控制。

trans-unit.source: Creates child controls.
trans-unit.target: 建立子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Creates control collection.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制項集合。

trans-unit.source: Creates the hierarchy of child controls that make up the control.
trans-unit.target: 建立組成控制項的子控制項階層。

trans-unit.target: 提要欄位範本不包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.target: 建立控制項樣式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether to display a **Cancel** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定布林值，指出是否顯示 [取消] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display **Cancel** on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 若要顯示**取消**上<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />，否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute" />和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the sidebar area on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 上顯示提要欄位區域則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute" /> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute" />和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: There can be a difference in the rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control depending on whether this property is set to `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: 可以有不同的轉譯的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>根據此屬性是否設定為控制項`true`或`false`。

trans-unit.source: When this property value is set to `true` and the sidebar is displayed, cell spacing is not applied to the `HeadCell`, `StepCell`, or `NavigationCell` elements of the control's table.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性值設定為`true`而且會顯示 [資訊看板]，儲存格間距不會套用到`HeadCell`， `StepCell`，或`NavigationCell`控制資料表的項目。

trans-unit.source: When this value is `false`, cell spacing is applied.
trans-unit.target: 當這個值是`false`，儲存格的空格會套用。

trans-unit.source: This may affect how the control is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會影響呈現控制項的方式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the **Finish** button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在按一下 [完成] 按鈕時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishButtonClick> event is raised when the **Finish** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishButtonClick>就會引發事件時**完成**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishButtonClick> event to provide additional processing when the **Finish** button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishButtonClick>事件來提供額外的處理時**完成**按鈕。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishButtonClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishButtonClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the **Finish** button is clicked, a confirmation message is written to `Label1` and the `Label1.Visible` property is set to `true` so that the message is displayed on the step.
trans-unit.target: 當**完成**按一下按鈕時，確認訊息會寫入`Label1`和`Label1.Visible`屬性設定為`true`，因此訊息會顯示在步驟。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the identifier for the **Finish** button.
trans-unit.target: 擷取 [完成] 按鈕的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: This field is static and read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是靜態且唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishButtonID> field is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishButtonID>欄位主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishButtonID> is `"FinishButton"`.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishButtonID>是`"FinishButton"`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the image that is displayed for the **Finish** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 [完成] 按鈕的顯示影像 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image displayed for **Finish** on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: 顯示影像的 URL**完成**上<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonType%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Image> field, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonImageUrl%2A> property to specify the image to display for the **Finish** button.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Image>欄位中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定要顯示之影像**完成** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object that defines the settings for the **Finish** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 物件的參考，該物件定義 [完成] 按鈕的設定。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that defines the style settings for **Finish** on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />所定義的樣式設定**完成**上<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonStyle%2A> property defines the appearance for the **Finish** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonStyle%2A>屬性定義的外觀**完成**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonStyle%2A> property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonStyle%2A>屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Any setting that is applied in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonStyle%2A> property overrides the corresponding setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的任何設定也就套用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonStyle%2A>屬性會覆寫中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text caption that is displayed for the **Finish** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 [完成] 按鈕的顯示文字標題。

trans-unit.source: The text caption displayed for **Finish** on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: 顯示的文字標題**完成**上<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <c>"Finish"</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<c>[完成]</c>。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the current locale for the server.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設文字會依據伺服器目前的地區設定進行當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonText%2A> property contains the text that is displayed for the **Finish** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonText%2A>屬性會包含文字的顯示**完成**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonType%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonText%2A> property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image in browsers that do not render images, or as the text of a link.
trans-unit.target: 值而定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonType%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonText%2A>屬性可顯示為文字的按鈕，以替代並不會轉譯影像的瀏覽器中的映像或連結的文字顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the field values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonType%2A> property and the respective effect of each on the **Finish** button text.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonType%2A>屬性，在每個個別的效果**完成**按鈕文字。

trans-unit.source: Text appears on the button.
trans-unit.target: 文字會出現在按鈕上。

trans-unit.source: Text appears as alternative text for the image.
trans-unit.target: 文字會顯示為影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: Text appears as link text.
trans-unit.target: 文字會顯示為連結文字。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of button that is rendered as the **Finish** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定呈現為 [完成]**Finish** 按鈕的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL that the user is redirected to when they click the **Finish** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當使用者按一下 [完成] 按鈕時會重新導向到的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL that the user is redirected to when they click **Finish** on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用者重新導向至當使用者按一下 URL**完成**上<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishDestinationPageUrl%2A> property specifies the step that is displayed when the user clicks the **Finish** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishDestinationPageUrl%2A>屬性會指定當使用者按一下顯示的步驟**完成**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that is used to display the navigation area on the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" /> step.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來在 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" /> 步驟顯示巡覽區域的樣板。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that defines the content for the navigation area for the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" /> on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> 上定義 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" /> 之巡覽區域內容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A> property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the navigation area on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish> step of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>屬性來指定自訂此內容上會顯示瀏覽區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish>步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the navigation area is rendered on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish> step.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立範本會指定功能區上的呈現方式定義內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish>步驟。

trans-unit.source: The custom content for the template is contained within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 範本的自訂內容內含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can add custom content to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A> object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A> object inline using `FinishNavigationTemplate` tags.
trans-unit.target: 您可以新增自訂內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>物件在設計檢視，或藉由定義藉由使用範本編輯模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>物件內嵌使用`FinishNavigationTemplate`標記。

trans-unit.source: The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example).
trans-unit.target: 內容可以是以純文字格式一樣簡單或複雜 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A> object that is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A> property must contain two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> controls, one with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> property set to "MoveComplete" and the other with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> property set to "MovePrevious", to enable the navigation feature.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>中所包含的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>屬性必須包含兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>控制項，一個具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A>屬性設為"MoveComplete 」，而且與其他其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A>屬性設為"MovePrevious 」，才能啟用瀏覽功能。

trans-unit.source: To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取以程式設計方式在範本中定義的控制項，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>要尋找控制項，控制項必須有物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A> property to create a custom template for the navigation area of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish> step for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>屬性來建立自訂功能區的範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish>步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the identifier for the **Previous** button on the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" /> step.
trans-unit.target: 擷取 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" /> 步驟之 [上一步] 按鈕的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: This field is static and read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是靜態且唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonID> field is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonID>欄位主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonID>`"FinishPreviousButton"`.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonID> `"FinishPreviousButton"`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the image that is displayed for the **Previous** button on the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" /> step.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" /> 步驟之 [上一步] 按鈕的顯示影像 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image displayed for **Previous** on the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: 顯示影像的 URL**上一步**上<see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" />的<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonType%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Image> field, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonImageUrl%2A> property to specify the image to display for the **Previous** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish> step.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Image>欄位中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定要顯示之影像**上一步**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish>步驟。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object that defines the settings for the **Previous** button on the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" /> step.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 物件的參考，該物件定義 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" /> 步驟之 [上一步] 按鈕的設定。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that defines the style settings for **Previous** on the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />所定義的樣式設定**上一步**上<see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" />的<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonStyle%2A> property defines the appearance for the **Previous** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish> step of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonStyle%2A>屬性定義的外觀**上一步**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish>步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonStyle%2A> property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonStyle%2A>屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Any setting that is applied in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonStyle%2A> property overrides the corresponding setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的任何設定也就套用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonStyle%2A>屬性會覆寫中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text caption that is displayed for the **Previous** button on the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" /> step.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" /> 步驟之 [上一步] 按鈕的顯示文字標題。

trans-unit.source: The text caption displayed for **Previous** on the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: 顯示的文字標題**上一步**上<see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" />的<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <c>"Previous"</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<c>「 上一步 」</c>。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the current locale for the server.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設文字會依據伺服器目前的地區設定進行當地語系化。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonText%2A>屬性會包含文字的顯示**上一步**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish>步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.target: 文字會顯示為影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。
