trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the design mode state.
trans-unit.target: 取得設計模式狀態。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> objects that have been accessed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回已存取之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> containing the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> objects that have been accessed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />，包含已存取的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.GetHistory%2A> method returns a collection containing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects that have been accessed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.GetHistory%2A>方法會傳回一個集合，其中包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>被存取的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects are arranged in the order in which they were accessed: the first item in the collection is the previous <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object, the second item in the collection is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object that was accessed before the previous step, and so on.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>物件已存取它們的順序排列： 集合中的第一個項目是先前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>物件，集合中的第二個項目為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>前一個步驟中，存取的物件，因此上。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> for which the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 傳回關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" />。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> for which the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 傳回關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> 索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType" /> value for the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.GetStepType%2A> method to determine the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> value of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.GetStepType%2A>方法，以判斷<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>值加上指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.GetStepType%2A> method to determine the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> value for the current step of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.GetStepType%2A>方法，以判斷相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>值目前步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Each time the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged> event is raised, the new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> value is retrieved and a message is written to `Label1`.
trans-unit.target: 每次<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged>引發事件時，新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>擷取值，並將訊息寫入`Label1`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate" /> placeholder in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate" /> 控制項中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 預留位置的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The placeholder ID must be set to "headerPlaceHolder".
trans-unit.target: 預留位置識別碼必須設"headerPlaceHolder"。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object that defines the settings for the header area on the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 物件的參考，該物件會在控制項上定義頁首區域的設定。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that defines the style settings for the header area on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 的參考，其會在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 上定義頁首區域的樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A> property defines the appearance for the header area on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A>屬性上定義的標頭區域的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A> property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A>屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that is used to display the header area on the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來在控制項上顯示頁首區域的樣板。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that contains the template for displaying the header area on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，包含用來在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 上顯示頁首區域的樣板。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A> property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the header area on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性來指定自訂此內容上會顯示的標頭區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the header area is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定的標頭區域的呈現方式的範本定義的內容。

trans-unit.source: The custom content for the template is contained within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 範本的自訂內容內含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can add custom content to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A> object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A> object inline using `HeaderTemplate` tags.
trans-unit.target: 您可以新增自訂內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>物件在設計檢視，或藉由定義藉由使用範本編輯模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>物件內嵌使用`HeaderTemplate`標記。

trans-unit.source: The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example).
trans-unit.target: 內容可以是以純文字格式一樣簡單或複雜 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。

trans-unit.source: To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取以程式設計方式在範本中定義的控制項，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>要尋找控制項，控制項必須有物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text caption that is displayed for the header area on the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項上頁首區域的顯示文字標題。

trans-unit.source: The text caption displayed for the header area on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 上頁首區域的顯示文字標題。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderText%2A> property defines the text caption that is displayed for the header area on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderText%2A>屬性會定義的標頭區域會顯示的文字標題<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the header area, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制標頭區域的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define your own custom UI for the header row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A> property instead of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以定義自己的自訂 UI 之標頭資料列，藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性而非<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderText%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A> properties are defined, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderText%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderText%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性定義，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderText%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged> event to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderText%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged>事件來更新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderText%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom content of the root container in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 控制項中根容器的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the custom content for the root container in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 控制項中根容器的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />，表示這個屬性尚未設定。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.LayoutTemplate%2A> property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.LayoutTemplate%2A>屬性來定義自訂使用者介面 (UI) 的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To specify a layout template, add a `LayoutTemplate` element inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control markup.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定版面配置範本，將`LayoutTemplate`元素內<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項標記。

trans-unit.source: Inside the `LayoutTemplate` element, add placeholders for the components of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 內部`LayoutTemplate`項目，加入元件的預留位置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Placeholders for the navigation, sidebar, and wizard-step sections of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control are required in the `LayoutTemplate` element.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽、 資訊看板，與精靈步驟區段的預留位置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項所需的`LayoutTemplate`項目。

trans-unit.source: You can modify the layout template in **Source** view.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改中的版面配置範本**來源**檢視。

trans-unit.source: Editing the layout template in **Design** view is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 編輯中的版面配置範本**設計**不支援檢視。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add a `LayoutTemplate` element to the `Wizard` control and how to format the components of the `Wizard` control by using `div` elements.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何將加入`LayoutTemplate`元素`Wizard`控制項，以及如何格式化的元件`Wizard`控制項使用`div`項目。

trans-unit.source: When the control renders, the `div` elements will be used instead of HTML tables to format the control.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項的轉譯、`div`而不是 HTML 表格格式控制項使用項目。

trans-unit.source: The control state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: 要還原的控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: Restores control state information.
trans-unit.target: 還原控制項狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The control state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: 要還原的控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: Loads view-state information.
trans-unit.target: 載入檢視狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="savedState" /> is not a valid <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.ViewState" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="savedState" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.ViewState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the command name that is associated with the **Finish** button.
trans-unit.target: 擷取與 [完成] 按鈕關聯的命令名稱。

trans-unit.source: This field is static and read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是靜態且唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveCompleteCommandName> field is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveCompleteCommandName>欄位主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveCompleteCommandName> is `"MoveComplete"`.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveCompleteCommandName>是`"MoveComplete"`。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the command name that is associated with the **Next** button.
trans-unit.target: 擷取與 [下一步] 按鈕關聯的命令名稱。

trans-unit.source: This field is static and read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是靜態且唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveNextCommandName> field is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveNextCommandName>欄位主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveNextCommandName> is `"MoveNext"`.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveNextCommandName>是`"MoveNext"`。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the command name that is associated with the **Previous** button.
trans-unit.target: 擷取與 [上一步] 按鈕關聯的命令名稱。

trans-unit.source: This field is static and read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是靜態且唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MovePreviousCommandName> field is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MovePreviousCommandName>欄位主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MovePreviousCommandName> is `"MovePrevious"`.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MovePreviousCommandName>是`"MovePrevious"`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" />-derived object to set as the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep" />.
trans-unit.target: 要設定為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> 之 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep" /> 衍生物件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" />-derived object as the value for the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> 衍生物件設定為 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveTo%2A> method to control which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object is set as the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A> property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveTo%2A>方法，以控制哪個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-衍生的物件設定的值為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>以程式設計方式控制。

trans-unit.source: This way, you can change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A> property dynamically based on other conditions during run time.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，您可以變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A>屬性動態地根據其他條件在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveTo%2A> method to control the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveTo%2A>方法來控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the value of `CheckBox1.Checked` is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A> property is set to `Wizard1.Step3`; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A> property is set to `Wizard1.Step2`.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`CheckBox1.Checked`是`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A>屬性設定為`Wizard1.Step3`，否則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A>屬性設定為`Wizard1.Step2`。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" />-derived object passed in is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveToCommandName>欄位主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveToCommandName> is `"Move"`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object that defines the settings for the buttons in the navigation area on the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 物件的參考，該物件會在控制項上定義巡覽區域中按鈕的設定。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that defines the style settings for the buttons in the navigation area on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 的參考，其會在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 上定義巡覽區域中按鈕的樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property defines the appearance for the buttons in the navigation area on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性上定義導覽區域中的按鈕的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property are merged with the individual button styles.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>個別按鈕樣式與合併屬性。

trans-unit.source: Any setting that is applied in the individual button style properties overrides the corresponding setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在個別的按鈕樣式屬性會套用任何設定會覆寫中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the `FinishPreviousButtonStyle.ForeColor` property to `"red"` and the `NavigationButtonStyle.ForeColor` property to `"green"`, the color for the button will be red because the individual style settings of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonStyle%2A> property override the settings of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您設定`FinishPreviousButtonStyle.ForeColor`屬性`"red"`和`NavigationButtonStyle.ForeColor`屬性`"green"`的色彩按鈕會變成紅色，因為個別樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonStyle%2A>屬性覆寫的設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>個別按鈕樣式設定會覆寫屬性樣式：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick> event is raised when the **Next** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick>就會引發事件時**下一步**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick> event to provide additional processing when the **Next** button is clicked.

trans-unit.source: Each time the **Next** button is clicked, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> property for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control is increased by 1 pixel, as measured by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> class.
trans-unit.target: 每次**下一步**按一下按鈕時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制會加 1 的像素所測量<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>類別。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.OnActiveStepChanged%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged> event when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control is changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.OnActiveStepChanged%2A>方法會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged>事件時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStep%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項變更。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged> event to provide additional processing when the current step that is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control changes.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged>事件來提供額外的處理，當目前的步驟，會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制的變更。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.OnActiveStepChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.OnActiveStepChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepChanged> event to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderText%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.OnActiveStepChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.OnActiveStepChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.OnActiveStepChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" />方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.OnActiveStepChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" />方法的基底類別，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarButtonID> field is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarButtonID>欄位主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarButtonID> is `"SideBarButton"`.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarButtonID>是`"SideBarButton"`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object that defines the settings for the buttons on the sidebar.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 物件的參考，該物件會在提要欄位上定義按鈕的設定。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that defines the style settings for the buttons on the sidebar of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 的參考，其會在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 的提要欄位上定義按鈕的樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarButtonStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of the buttons on the sidebar of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarButtonStyle%2A>屬性定義的 [資訊看板] 上的按鈕外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarButtonStyle%2A> property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarButtonStyle%2A>屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarButtonStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarButtonStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Any settings that are applied in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarButtonStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 會套用任何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarButtonStyle%2A>屬性覆寫的屬性中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> style properties are overridden by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarButtonStyle%2A> settings:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>樣式屬性會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarButtonStyle%2A>設定：

trans-unit.source: However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control sidebar, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarButtonStyle%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 不過，當您使用範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制 [資訊看板]，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarButtonStyle%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Any settings that are applied in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 會套用任何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarStyle%2A>屬性覆寫的屬性中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The height property for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarStyle%2A> is ignored if the height is set to less than the height of the wizard.
trans-unit.target: Height 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarStyle%2A>會被忽略，如果將高度設為低於精靈的高度。

trans-unit.source: Values set for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationStyle%2A> height and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A> height add to the total height of the wizard.
trans-unit.target: 為設定值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationStyle%2A>高度和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A>高度將加入至精靈的總高度。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the Wizard height is set to 500px and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationStyle%2A> height or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A> height is set to 50px or 10%, then the total wizard height is 550px.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果精靈高度設為 500px 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationStyle%2A>高度或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A>高度設為 50px 或 10%，則總精靈高度是 550px。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> style properties are overridden by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarStyle%2A> settings:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>樣式屬性會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarStyle%2A>設定：

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that is used to display the sidebar area on the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來在控制項上顯示提要欄位區域的樣板。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that contains the template for displaying the sidebar area on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，包含用來在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 上顯示提要欄位區域的樣板。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A> property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the sidebar area on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A>屬性來指定自訂此內容上會顯示 [資訊看板] 區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the sidebar area is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定的 [資訊看板] 區域的呈現方式的範本定義的內容。

trans-unit.source: The custom content for the template is contained within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 範本的自訂內容內含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can add custom content to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A> object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A> object inline using `SideBarTemplate` tags.
trans-unit.target: 您可以新增自訂內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A>物件在設計檢視，或藉由定義藉由使用範本編輯模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A>物件內嵌使用`SideBarTemplate`標記。

trans-unit.source: The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example).
trans-unit.target: 內容可以是以純文字格式一樣簡單或複雜 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A> object must contain a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property is set to `"SideBarList"` to enable the sidebar navigation feature.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A>物件必須包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性設定為`"SideBarList"`啟用提要欄位巡覽功能。

trans-unit.source: Also, the `"SideBarList"` on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control must contain an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> control.
trans-unit.target: 此外，`"SideBarList"`上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項必須包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取以程式設計方式在範本中定義的控制項，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>要尋找控制項，控制項必須有物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to the `SideBarTemplate` element and how to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control to navigate the steps.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何將加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制權傳輸至`SideBarTemplate`項目，以及如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控制項來巡覽步驟。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that is used to render alternate text that notifies screen readers to skip the content in the sidebar area.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來呈現替代文字的值，該文字會告知螢幕助讀員略過提要欄位區域中的內容。

trans-unit.source: A string that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> renders as alternate text with an invisible image, as a hint to screen readers.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 將字串呈現為使用替代文字的不可見影像，以做為螢幕助讀員的提示。

trans-unit.source: The default is <c>"Skip Navigation Links"</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<c>「 略過巡覽連結 」</c>。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the current locale for the server.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設文字會依據伺服器目前的地區設定進行當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SkipLinkText%2A> property to specify the alternate text for a hidden image that is read by screen readers to provide the ability to skip the content for a sidebar area.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SkipLinkText%2A>屬性來指定讀取螢幕助讀程式，讓您略過 [資訊看板] 區域的內容可以隱藏影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the hidden image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的文字會提供具有描述可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的隱藏影像的輔助技術裝置。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplaySideBar%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SkipLinkText%2A> property does not create a hidden image with alternate text.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>屬性設定為`false`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SkipLinkText%2A>屬性不會建立隱藏的影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that is used to display the navigation area on the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" /> step of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來在 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 步驟顯示巡覽區域的樣板。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that contains the template for displaying the navigation area on the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，包含用來在 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 上顯示巡覽區域的樣板。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A> property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the navigation area on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start> step of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>屬性來指定自訂此內容上會顯示瀏覽區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start>步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the navigation area is rendered on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start> step.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立範本會指定功能區上的呈現方式定義內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start>步驟。

trans-unit.source: The custom content for the template is contained within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 範本的自訂內容內含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can add custom content to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A> object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A> object inline using `StartNavigationTemplate` tags.
trans-unit.target: 您可以新增自訂內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>物件在設計檢視，或藉由定義藉由使用範本編輯模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>物件內嵌使用`StartNavigationTemplate`標記。

trans-unit.source: The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example).
trans-unit.target: 內容可以是以純文字格式一樣簡單或複雜 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A> object that is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A> property must contain an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> property set to `"MoveNext"` to enable the navigation feature.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>中所包含的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>屬性必須包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>用來控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A>屬性設定為`"MoveNext"`啟用瀏覽功能。

trans-unit.source: To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取以程式設計方式在範本中定義的控制項，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>要尋找控制項，控制項必須有物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the identifier that is associated with the **Next** button on the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" /> step.
trans-unit.target: 擷取與 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" /> 步驟之 [下一步] 按鈕關聯的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: This field is static and read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是靜態且唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonID> is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonID>主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonID> is `"StartNextButton"`.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonID>是`"StartNextButton"`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the image that is displayed for the **Next** button on the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" /> step.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" /> 步驟之 [下一步] 按鈕的顯示影像 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image displayed for **Next** on the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: 顯示影像的 URL**下一步**上<see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" />的<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonType%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Image> field, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonImageUrl%2A> property to specify the image to display for the **Next** button.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Image>欄位中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定要顯示之影像**下一步** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object that defines the settings for the **Next** button on the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" /> step.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 物件的參考，該物件定義 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" /> 步驟之 [下一步] 按鈕的設定。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that defines the style settings for **Next** on the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: 參考<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />所定義的樣式設定**下一步**上<see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" />的<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonStyle%2A> property defines the appearance for the **Next** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start> step of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonStyle%2A>屬性定義的外觀**下一步**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start>步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonStyle%2A> property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonStyle%2A>屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Any setting that is applied in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonStyle%2A> property overrides the corresponding setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的任何設定也就套用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonStyle%2A>屬性會覆寫中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text caption that is displayed for the **Next** button on the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" /> step.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" /> 步驟之 [下一步] 按鈕的顯示文字標題。

trans-unit.source: The text caption displayed for **Next** on the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: 顯示的文字標題**下一步**上<see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" />的<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <c>"Next"</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<c>下一步 」</c>。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the current locale for the server.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設文字會依據伺服器目前的地區設定進行當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonText%2A> property contains the text that is displayed for the **Next** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start> step of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonText%2A>屬性會包含文字的顯示**下一步**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start>步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonType%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonText%2A> property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image in browsers that do not render images, or as the text of a link.
trans-unit.target: 值而定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonType%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonText%2A>屬性可顯示為文字的按鈕，以替代並不會轉譯影像的瀏覽器中的映像或連結的文字顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the field values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonType%2A> property and the respective effect of each on the **Next** button text.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNextButtonType%2A>屬性，在每個個別的效果**下一步**按鈕文字。

trans-unit.source: Text appears on the button.
trans-unit.target: 文字會出現在按鈕上。

trans-unit.source: Text appears as alternative text for the image.
trans-unit.target: 文字會顯示為影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: Text appears as a link.
trans-unit.target: 文字會顯示為連結。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of button that is rendered as the **Next** button on the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" /> step.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" /> 步驟呈現為 [下一步] 按鈕的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that is used to display the navigation area on any <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" />-derived objects other than the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" />, the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" />, or <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Complete" /> step.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" />、<see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" /> 步驟以外之任何 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Complete" /> 衍生物件上顯示巡覽區域的樣板。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that contains the template for displaying the navigation area on any <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" />-derived objects of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control other than the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" />, <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" />, or <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Complete" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含樣板的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，用來在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" />、<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Start" /> 以外之 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Finish" /> 控制項的任何 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Complete" /> 衍生類別上顯示巡覽區域。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A> property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the navigation area on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Step> step of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>屬性來指定自訂此內容上會顯示瀏覽區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Step>步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the navigation area is rendered on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Step> step.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立範本會指定功能區上的呈現方式定義內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Step>步驟。

trans-unit.source: The custom content for the template is contained within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 範本的自訂內容內含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can add custom content to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A> object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A> object inline using `StepNavigationTemplate` tags.
trans-unit.target: 您可以新增自訂內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A>物件在設計檢視，或藉由定義藉由使用範本編輯模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A>物件內嵌使用`StepNavigationTemplate`標記。

trans-unit.source: The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example).
trans-unit.target: 內容可以是以純文字格式一樣簡單或複雜 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A> object that is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A> property must contain two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> controls, one with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> property set to `"MoveNext"` and one with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> property set to `"MovePrevious"`, to enable the navigation feature.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A>中所包含的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A>屬性必須包含兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>控制項，一個具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A>屬性設定為`"MoveNext"`而另一個為其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A>屬性設定為`"MovePrevious"`，若要啟用瀏覽功能。

trans-unit.source: To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取以程式設計方式在範本中定義的控制項，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>要尋找控制項，控制項必須有物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the identifier that is associated with the **Next** button.
trans-unit.target: 擷取與 [下一步] 按鈕關聯的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: This field is static and read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是靜態且唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonID> field is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonID>欄位主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonID> is `"StepNextButton"`.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonID>是`"StepNextButton"`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the image that is displayed for the **Next** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 [下一步] 按鈕的顯示影像 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image displayed for **Next** on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: 顯示影像的 URL**下一步**上<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonType%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Image> field, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonImageUrl%2A> property to specify the image to display for the **Next** button.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Image>欄位中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定要顯示之影像**下一步** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object that defines the settings for the **Next** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 物件的參考，該物件定義 [下一步]**Next** 按鈕的設定。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that defines the style settings for **Next** on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: 參考<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />所定義的樣式設定**下一步**上<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonStyle%2A> property defines the appearance for the **Next** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonStyle%2A>屬性定義的外觀**下一步**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonStyle%2A> property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonStyle%2A>屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Any setting that is applied in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonStyle%2A> property overrides the corresponding setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的任何設定也就套用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonStyle%2A>屬性會覆寫中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text caption that is displayed for the **Next** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 [下一步] 按鈕的顯示文字標題。

trans-unit.source: The text caption displayed for **Next** on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: 顯示的文字標題**下一步**上<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <c>"Next"</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<c>下一步 」</c>。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the current locale for the server.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設文字會依據伺服器目前的地區設定進行當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonText%2A> property contains the text that is displayed for the **Next** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonText%2A>屬性會包含文字的顯示**下一步**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonType%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonText%2A> property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image, or as the text of a link.
trans-unit.target: 值而定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonType%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonText%2A>屬性可顯示為文字的按鈕，以替代映像，或連結的文字顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the field values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonType%2A> property and the respective effect of each on the **Next** button text.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNextButtonType%2A>屬性，在每個個別的效果**下一步**按鈕文字。

trans-unit.source: Text appears on the button.
trans-unit.target: 文字會出現在按鈕上。

trans-unit.source: Text appears as alternative text for the image.
trans-unit.target: 文字會顯示為影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: Text appears as a link.
trans-unit.target: 文字會顯示為連結。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of button that is rendered as the **Next** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定呈現為 [下一步] 按鈕的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the identifier that is associated with the **Previous** button.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepPreviousButtonID>欄位主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 物件的參考，該物件定義 [上一步] 按鈕的設定。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that defines the style settings for **Previous** on a <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType.Step" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.

trans-unit.source: Any setting that is applied in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepPreviousButtonStyle%2A> property overrides the corresponding setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的任何設定也就套用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepPreviousButtonStyle%2A>屬性會覆寫中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text caption that is displayed for the **Previous** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 [上一步] 按鈕的顯示文字標題。

trans-unit.source: The text caption displayed for **Previous** on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: 顯示的文字標題**上一步**上<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <c>"Previous"</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<c>「 上一步 」</c>。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the current locale for the server.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設文字會依據伺服器目前的地區設定進行當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepPreviousButtonText%2A> property contains the text that is displayed for the **Previous** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepPreviousButtonText%2A>屬性會包含文字的顯示**上一步**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepPreviousButtonType%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepPreviousButtonText%2A> property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image in browsers that do not render images, or as the text of a link.
trans-unit.target: 值而定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepPreviousButtonType%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepPreviousButtonText%2A>屬性可顯示為文字的按鈕，以替代並不會轉譯影像的瀏覽器中的映像或連結的文字顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the field values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepPreviousButtonType%2A> property and the respective effect of each on the **Previous** button text.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepPreviousButtonType%2A>屬性，在每個個別的效果**上一步**按鈕文字。

trans-unit.source: Text appears on the button.
trans-unit.target: 文字會出現在按鈕上。

trans-unit.source: Text appears as alternative text for the image.
trans-unit.target: 文字會顯示為影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: Text appears as a link.
trans-unit.target: 文字會顯示為連結。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of button that is rendered as the **Previous** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定呈現為 [上一步] 按鈕的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object that defines the settings for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 物件的參考，該物件會定義 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> 物件的設定。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that defines the style settings for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> objects on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 的參考，其會在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> 上定義 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 物件的樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A> property gets a reference to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that defines the appearance for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> objects on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A>屬性取得的參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>物件，定義的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A> property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A>屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Any setting that is applied in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A> property overrides the corresponding setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 中的任何設定也就套用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A>屬性會覆寫中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A> properties can be set to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A>屬性可以設定為覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項：

trans-unit.source: When you use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep> template to define the appearance for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> objects, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep>範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> value that corresponds to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得對應至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> value that corresponds to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 對應至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.TagKey%2A> property is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.TagKey%2A>屬性主要由控制項開發人員使用以擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Tracks view state.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> placeholder in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> 控制項中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 預留位置的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The placeholder ID must be set to "WizardStepPlaceHolder".
trans-unit.target: 預留位置識別碼必須設"WizardStepPlaceHolder"。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection containing all the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> objects that are defined for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含所有為控制項所定義之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection" /> representing all the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> objects defined for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection" />，表示所有為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> 所定義的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> property returns a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects that make up the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A>屬性傳回的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>構成物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> collection to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects that are contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A>來存取集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>中所包含的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>以程式設計方式控制。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Clear%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Insert%2A> methods to manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects in the collection programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Clear%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Insert%2A>方法來管理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>物件在集合中以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> is persisted in Source view.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，請注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>保存在原始碼檢視。

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> might be pointing to a different step.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A>屬性在設計檢視中按一下 [資訊看板] 按鈕時，您接著執行網頁的第一個步驟`Wizard`控制項可能不會顯示，因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>可能指向不同的步驟。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control contains multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collections, the collections will be merged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項包含多個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>集合，集合將會合併。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control programmatically and how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A> method to add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>以程式設計方式控制，以及如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>方法，將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>物件加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A>集合。
